2025-09-30.content: The [customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK)](https://cloud.google.com/memorystore/docs/cluster/about-cmek) feature for Memorystore for Redis Cluster is now [Generally Available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Memorystore for Redis Cluster Now Supports CMEK
summary.summary: We are pleased to announce that Customer-Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK) for Memorystore for Redis Cluster is now Generally Available. This feature allows you to manage your own encryption keys for enhanced security.
